shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Megahorn
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Mega Kick
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Mega Punch
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Metal Claw
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

name: Mud Shot
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

name: Mud-Slap
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Night Shade
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's level.

name: Pain Split
description: The user and the target's HP become the average of their current HP, rounded down, but not more than the maximum HP of either one.
shortDescription: Shares HP of user and target equally.

name: Peck
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Poison Sting
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Poison Tail
description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

name: Pound
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Powder Snow
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze the foe(s).

name: Present
description: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
shortDescription: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

name: Psybeam
description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to confuse the target.

name: Psychic
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Quick Attack
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Usually goes first.

name: Rain Dance
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Rock Slide
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

name: Rock Throw
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Rollout
description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

name: Sacred Fire
description: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

name: Sand Attack
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Sandstorm
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Sand Veil Ability. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages.

name: Scratch
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Seismic Toss
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
shortDescription: Target's Def halved during damage. User faints.

name: Shadow Ball
description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Shadow Punch
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Shock Wave
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Sky Attack
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.
shortDescription: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

name: Slam
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Slash
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Sludge
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Smokescreen
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Solar Beam
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Damage is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

name: Spark
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Spit Up
description: Damage is multiplied by the user's Stockpile count. This move does not apply damage variance and cannot be a critical hit. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Unless this move misses, the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
shortDescription: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

name: Splash
description: No competitive use.
shortDescription: No competitive use.

name: Steel Wing
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

name: Stomp
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Strength
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Sunny Day
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

name: Super Fang
description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

name: Superpower
description: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

name: Swift
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.

name: Tail Whip
description: Lowers the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) Defense by 1.

name: Take Down
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/4 recoil.

name: Thunder Punch
description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Thunder Shock
description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Tri Attack
description: Has a 20% chance to either burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 20% chance to paralyze or burn or freeze target.

name: Triple Kick
description: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.
shortDescription: Hits 3 times. Each hit can miss, but power rises.

name: Twister
description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce or Fly.
shortDescription: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

name: Vise Grip
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Water Gun
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Water Pulse
description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 20% chance to confuse the target.

name: Water Spout
description: Power is equal to (user's current HP * 150 / user's maximum HP), rounded down, but not less than 1.
shortDescription: Less power as user's HP decreases. Hits foe(s).

name: Wing Attack
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Withdraw
description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

name: Acupressure
description: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if the user or ally has a substitute.
shortDescription: Raises a random stat of the user or an ally by 2.

name: Aromatherapy
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition.
shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

name: Aqua Ring
description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn while it remains active. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will receive the healing effect.
shortDescription: User recovers 1/16 max HP per turn.

name: Beat Up
description: Deals typeless damage. Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. For each hit, the damage formula uses the participating Pokemon's base Attack as the Attack stat, the target's base Defense as the Defense stat, and ignores stat stages and other effects that modify Attack or Defense; each hit is considered to come from the user.
shortDescription: All healthy allies aid in damaging the target.

name: Bide
description: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and ignores type immunity.
shortDescription: Waits 2 turns; deals double the damage taken.

name: Bind
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Bone Rush
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Brave Bird
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Bullet Seed
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain. Fails if the user has the Multitype Ability or if the type is one of the user's current types.
shortDescription: Changes user's type based on terrain. (Normal)

name: Chatter
description: Has an X% chance to confuse the target, where X is 0 unless the user is a Chatot that hasn't Transformed. If the user is a Chatot, X is 1, 11, or 31 depending on the volume of Chatot's recorded cry, if any; 1 for no recording or low volume, 11 for medium volume, and 31 for high volume.
shortDescription: For Chatot, 31% chance to confuse the target.

name: Clamp
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Conversion
description: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides this move and Curse, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
shortDescription: Changes user's type to match a known move.

name: Cotton Spore
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Covet
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Griseous Orb, or if the target has the Multitype Ability. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.
shortDescription: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

name: Crabhammer
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Crush Grip
description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP) + 1, rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

name: Curse
description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected or has a substitute.
shortDescription: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

name: Defog
description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Stealth Rock end for the target's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.
shortDescription: -1 evasion; clears target side's hazards/screens.

name: Detect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used, up to a maximum of 8. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

name: Disable
description: For 4 to 7 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move has 0 PP.
shortDescription: For 4-7 turns, disables the target's last move.

name: Doom Desire
description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Double-Edge
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Drain Punch
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Dream Eater
description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep and does not have a substitute. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.
shortDescription: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

name: Embargo
description: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

name: Encore
description: For 4 to 8 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.
shortDescription: The target repeats its last move for 4-8 turns.

name: Endeavor
description: Deals damage to the target equal to (target's current HP - user's current HP). The target is unaffected if its current HP is less than or equal to the user's current HP.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

name: Extreme Speed
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Usually goes first.

name: Fake Out
description: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
shortDescription: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

name: Feint
description: Fails unless the target is using Detect or Protect. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect or Protect for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally.
shortDescription: Breaks protection. Fails if target is not protecting.

name: Fire Spin
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Flail
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 43 to 48, 40 if X is 22 to 42, 80 if X is 13 to 21, 100 if X is 6 to 12, 150 if X is 2 to 5, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 64 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

name: Flare Blitz
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

name: Fling
description: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, or if the user is under the effect of Embargo.
shortDescription: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move, but it still loses PP.
shortDescription: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

name: Foresight
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.
shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Fury Cutter
description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Giga Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Glare
description: Paralyzes the target.
shortDescription: Paralyzes the target.

name: Gravity
description: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, and Magnet Rise end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, and Splash are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
shortDescription: 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.

name: Growth
description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

name: Heal Bell
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured.
shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

name: Heal Block
description: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing moves are unusable, move effects that grant healing will not heal, but Abilities and items will continue to heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under the effect. Pain Split is unaffected.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out immediately and the healing happens after hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
shortDescription: User faints. Replacement is fully healed.

name: High Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses HP equal to half the target's maximum HP if the target was immune, rounded down, otherwise half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
shortDescription: If miss, user takes 1/2 damage it would've dealt.

name: Icicle Spear
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Imprison
description: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active. Fails if no opposing Pokemon know any of the user's moves.
shortDescription: No foe can use any move known by the user.

name: Ingrain
description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes and Toxic Spikes, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
shortDescription: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

name: Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses HP equal to half the target's maximum HP if the target was immune, rounded down, otherwise half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
shortDescription: If miss, user takes 1/2 damage it would've dealt.

name: Knock Off
description: The target's held item is lost for the rest of the battle, unless the item is a Griseous Orb or the target has the Multitype or Sticky Hold Abilities. During the effect, the target cannot obtain a new item by any means.
shortDescription: Target's item is lost and it cannot obtain another.

name: Last Resort
description: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
shortDescription: Fails unless each known move has been used.

name: Leech Seed
description: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.
shortDescription: 1/8 of target's HP is restored to user every turn.

name: Light Screen
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from special attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

name: Lock-On
description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. When this effect is started against the target, this and Mind Reader's effects end for every other Pokemon against that target. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, this effect is restarted against the same target for the replacement. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.
shortDescription: User's next move will not miss the target.

name: Lucky Chant
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out immediately and the healing happens after hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
shortDescription: User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.

name: Magic Coat
description: The user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. If the move targets both opposing Pokemon, the Pokemon under this effect will reflect the move only targeting the original user. The effect ends once a move is reflected or at the end of the turn. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.
shortDescription: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

name: Magma Storm
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Magnet Rise
description: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effect of Ingrain.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

name: Me First
description: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Me First, Mirror Coat, Struggle, or Thief. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
shortDescription: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

name: Metal Burst
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.
shortDescription: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

name: Metronome
description: A random move is selected for use, other than Assist, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Trick, or any move the user already knows.
shortDescription: Picks a random move.

name: Mimic
description: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has 5 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Chatter, Metronome, Mimic, Sketch, or Struggle.
shortDescription: The last move the target used replaces this one.

name: Minimize
description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Stomp will have its power doubled if used against the user while it is active.
shortDescription: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.

name: Miracle Eye
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type.
shortDescription: Psychic hits Dark. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Mirror Move
description: The user uses the last move that successfully targeted the user. The copied move is used with no specific target. Fails if no move has targeted the user, if the move was called by another move, if the move is Encore, or if the move cannot be copied by this move.
shortDescription: User uses the target's last used move against it.

name: Mist
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members are protected from having their stat stages lowered by other Pokemon. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from stat drops.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Morning Sun
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Mud Sport
description: While the user is active, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
shortDescription: Weakens Electric-type attacks to 1/2 their power.

name: Nature Power
description: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack in Wi-Fi battles.
shortDescription: Attack changes based on terrain. (Tri Attack)

name: Nightmare
description: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
shortDescription: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.
shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Outrage
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Payback
description: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn. Switching in counts as an action.
shortDescription: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

name: Pay Day
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Scatters coins.

name: Perish Song
description: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
shortDescription: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Poison Gas
description: Poisons the target.
shortDescription: Poisons the foe(s).

name: Power Trick
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Protect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used, up to a maximum of 8. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

name: Psych Up
description: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
shortDescription: Copies the target's current stat stages.

name: Pursuit
description: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using U-turn, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon becomes active immediately.
shortDescription: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

name: Rapid Spin
description: If this move is successful, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end against the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.
shortDescription: Frees user from hazards, binding, Leech Seed.

name: Recycle
description: The user regains the item last used by a Pokemon in its current position on the field, even if that Pokemon was not the user. Fails if the user is holding an item, if no items have been used at the user's position, or if the item was lost to Covet, Knock Off, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
shortDescription: Restores the item the user last used.

name: Reflect
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from physical attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

name: Reversal
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 43 to 48, 40 if X is 22 to 42, 80 if X is 13 to 21, 100 if X is 6 to 12, 150 if X is 2 to 5, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 64 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

name: Roar
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.
shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

name: Rock Blast
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Role Play
description: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Multitype or already matches the target, if the target's Ability is Multitype or Wonder Guard, or if the user is holding a Griseous Orb.
shortDescription: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

name: Safeguard
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

name: Sand Tomb
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Scary Face
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Secret Power
description: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain.
shortDescription: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

name: Sketch
description: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
shortDescription: Permanently copies the last move target used.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Multitype or Wonder Guard, if both have the same Ability, or if either is holding a Griseous Orb.
shortDescription: The user and the target trade Abilities.

name: Sleep Talk
description: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Me First, Metronome, Mirror Move, Sleep Talk, Uproar, or any two-turn move.
shortDescription: User must be asleep. Uses another known move.

name: Snatch
description: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move this turn, the applicable moves are stolen by each of those Pokemon in turn order, and only the last user in turn order will gain the effects.
shortDescription: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

name: Snore
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
shortDescription: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

name: Spikes
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

name: Spite
description: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
shortDescription: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

name: Stealth Rock
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

name: Struggle
description: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
shortDescription: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

name: Substitute
description: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
shortDescription: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

name: Sucker Punch
description: Fails if the target did not select a physical or special attack for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
shortDescription: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

name: Swallow
description: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
shortDescription: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Griseous Orb, if neither is holding an item, if either has the Multitype Ability, if either is under the effect of Knock Off, or if the target has the Sticky Hold Ability.
shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Tackle
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Tail Glow
description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Tailwind
description: For 3 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
shortDescription: For 3 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

name: Taunt
description: For 3 to 5 turns, prevents the target from using non-damaging moves.
shortDescription: For 3-5 turns, the target can't use status moves.

name: Thrash
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Torment
description: Prevents the target from selecting the same move for use two turns in a row. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
shortDescription: Target can't select the same move twice in a row.

name: Toxic
description: Badly poisons the target.
shortDescription: Badly poisons the target.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, as well as switching in with a substitute.
shortDescription: Poisons grounded foes on switch-in. Max 2 layers.

name: Transform
description: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, IVs, species, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP. This move fails if the target has transformed.
shortDescription: Copies target's stats, moves, types, and Ability.

name: Trick
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Griseous Orb, if neither is holding an item, if either has the Multitype Ability, if either is under the effect of Knock Off, or if the target has the Sticky Hold Ability.
shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

name: Trick Room
description: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon with lower Speed will move before those with higher Speed, within their priority brackets. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
shortDescription: Goes last. For 5 turns, turn order is reversed.

name: Uproar
description: The user spends three to six turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. During effect, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon that are already asleep wake up as their turn starts or at the end of each turn, including the last one. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
shortDescription: Lasts 3-6 turns. Active Pokemon cannot sleep.

name: Volt Tackle
description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

name: Water Sport
description: While the user is active, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
shortDescription: Weakens Fire-type attacks to 1/2 their power.

name: Whirlpool
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.
shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

name: Wish
description: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of its maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
shortDescription: Next turn, heals 50% of the recipient's max HP.

name: Wood Hammer
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Worry Seed
description: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype or Truant, or if the target is holding a Griseous Orb.
shortDescription: The target's Ability becomes Insomnia.

name: Wrap
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Wring Out
description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP) + 1, rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

name: Yawn
description: Causes the target to fall asleep at the end of the next turn. Fails when used if the target cannot fall asleep or if it already has a non-volatile status condition. At the end of the next turn, if the target is still active, does not have a non-volatile status condition, and can fall asleep, it falls asleep. If the target becomes affected, this effect cannot be prevented by Safeguard or a substitute, or by falling asleep and waking up during the effect.
shortDescription: Puts the target to sleep after 1 turn.

name: Absorb
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Acid Armor
description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

name: Air Cutter
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Air Slash
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Assurance
description: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles if target was damaged this turn.

name: Aura Sphere
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Barrier
description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

name: Blizzard
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Hail.

name: Block
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Bounce
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Bounces turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.

name: Bubble
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

name: Bug Buzz
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Charm
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

name: Copycat
description: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, or Trick.
shortDescription: Uses the last move used in the battle.

name: Dig
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Digs underground turn 1, strikes turn 2.

name: Dive
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Dives underwater turn 1, strikes turn 2.

name: Draco Meteor
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Energy Ball
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Extrasensory
description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Fire Blast
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Flamethrower
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fly

name: Counter

If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Hail.

name: Block
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Bounce
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Bounces turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.

name: Bubble
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

name: Bug Buzz
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Ground type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain. Fails if the user's type cannot be changed or if the user is already purely that type.
shortDescription: Changes user's type based on terrain. (Ground)

name: Charm
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

name: Chatter
description: Has an X% chance to confuse the target, where X is 0 unless the user is a Chatot that hasn't Transformed. If the user is a Chatot, X is 0 or 10 depending on the volume of Chatot's recorded cry, if any; 0 for a low volume or no recording, 10 for a medium to high volume recording.
shortDescription: For Chatot, 10% chance to confuse the target.

name: Conversion
description: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides this move, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
shortDescription: Changes user's type to match a known move.

name: Copycat
description: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Bestow, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, or Trick.
shortDescription: Uses the last move used in the battle.

name: Cotton Spore
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Covet
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, or a Genesect holding a Drive. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
shortDescription: If the user has no item, it steals the target's.

name: Crabhammer
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Defog
description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Stealth Rock end for the target's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.
shortDescription: -1 evasion; clears target side's hazards/screens.

name: Dig
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Digs underground turn 1, strikes turn 2.

name: Dive
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Dives underwater turn 1, strikes turn 2.

name: Draco Meteor
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Drain Punch
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Dream Eater
description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User gains 1/2 HP inflicted. Sleeping target only.

name: Echoed Voice
description: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
shortDescription: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.

name: Electro Ball
description: The power of this move depends on (user's current Speed / target's current Speed), rounded down. Power is equal to 150 if the result is 4 or more, 120 if 3, 80 if 2, 60 if 1, 40 if less than 1. If the target's current Speed is 0, it is treated as 1 instead.
shortDescription: More power the faster the user is than the target.

name: Energy Ball
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Extrasensory
description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 10% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Feint
description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect or Protect for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target is an opponent and its side is protected by Quick Guard or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the opponent's side normally.
shortDescription: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

name: Final Gambit
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

name: Fire Blast
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fire Pledge
description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
shortDescription: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

name: Flamethrower
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fly
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

name: Follow Me
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user if they are in range. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double or Triple Battle. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

name: Frost Breath
description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit.

name: Fury Cutter
description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Giga Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Grass Pledge
description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
shortDescription: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.

name: Gunk Shot
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Gyro Ball

name: Ice Beam
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

name: Incinerate
description: The target loses its held item if it is a Berry. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

name: Knock Off
description: If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item, or force a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect to lose their Griseous Orb, Plate, or Drive, respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Light Screen
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double or Triple Battle. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

name: Low Sweep
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

name: Magic Room
description: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

name: Magma Storm
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns; seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP (1/8 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another partial-trapping move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

name: Mean Look
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Mega Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

description: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

name: Minimize
description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2 stages. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Stomp and Steamroller will have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.
shortDescription: Raises the user's evasiveness by 2.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Mud Sport
description: While the user is active, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active for any Pokemon.
shortDescription: Weakens Electric-type attacks to 1/3 their power.

name: Muddy Water
description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.

name: Nature Power
