name: Comet Punch
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Constrict
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

name: Continental Crush
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Corkscrew Crash
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Curse
description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
shortDescription: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

name: Dark Void
description: Causes the target to fall asleep. This move cannot be used successfully unless the user's current form, while considering Transform, is Darkrai.
shortDescription: Darkrai: Causes the foe(s) to fall asleep.

name: Defog
description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage. If this move is successful and whether or not the target's evasiveness was affected, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side. Ignores a target's substitute, although a substitute will still block the lowering of evasiveness.
shortDescription: -1 evasion; clears user and target side's hazards.

name: Devastating Drake
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Dive
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool but takes double damage from them, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Dives underwater turn 1, strikes turn 2.

name: Dizzy Punch
description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 20% chance to confuse the target.

name: Double Slap
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Dragon Hammer
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Dragon Rage
description: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.
shortDescription: Deals 40 HP of damage to the target.

name: Egg Bomb
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Electric Terrain
description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Electric Terrain. During the effect, the power of Electric-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep; Pokemon already asleep do not wake up. Grounded Pokemon cannot become affected by Yawn or fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into an Electric type, Nature Power becomes Thunderbolt, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause paralysis. Fails if the current terrain is Electric Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Grounded: +Electric power, can't sleep.

name: Embargo
description: For 5 turns, the target's held item has no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by the target. Items thrown at the target with Fling will still activate for it. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to use items.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the target's item has no effect.

name: Extreme Evoboost
description: Raises the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

name: Feint Attack
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Flame Burst
description: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
shortDescription: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

name: Flash
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Floral Healing
description: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

name: Fly
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

name: Foresight
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Frustration
description: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
shortDescription: Max 102 power at minimum Happiness.

name: Genesis Supernova
description: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: Summons Psychic Terrain.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Grass Knot
description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
shortDescription: More power the heavier the target.

name: Grass Whistle
description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.

name: Guardian of Alola
description: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

name: Heal Bell
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured.
shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

name: Heal Block
description: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected. Relevant Z-Powered moves can still be selected and executed during this effect.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
shortDescription: User faints. Replacement is fully healed.

name: Heal Order
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

name: Heart Stamp
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Heart Swap

name: Heat Crash

shortDescription: More power the heavier the user than the target.

name: Heavy Slam
description: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: More power the heavier the user than the target.

name: Hidden Power
description: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
shortDescription: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

name: Howl

shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1.

name: Hydro Vortex

name: Hyperspace Fury

If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
shortDescription: Hoopa-U: Lowers user's Def by 1; breaks protect.

name: Hyperspace Hole

If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
shortDescription: Breaks the target's protection for this turn.

name: Ice Ball
description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

name: Ice Hammer
description: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Speed by 1.

name: Inferno Overdrive
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Ion Deluge

shortDescription: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

name: Judgment
description: This move's type depends on the user's held Plate.
shortDescription: Type varies based on the held Plate.

name: Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses half of its maximum HP, rounded down, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
shortDescription: User is hurt by 50% of its max HP if it misses.

name: Karate Chop
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.

name: King's Shield
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon trying to make contact with the user have their Attack lowered by 2 stages. Non-damaging moves go through this protection. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Low Kick
description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
shortDescription: More power the heavier the target.

name: Lucky Chant
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot be struck by a critical hit. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, shields user's party from critical hits.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
shortDescription: User faints. Replacement is fully healed, with PP.

name: Magnet Bomb
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Magnitude
description: The power of this move varies; 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power varies; 2x on Dig.

name: Malicious Moonsault
description: Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: Damage doubles if the target used Minimize.

name: Meditate
description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1.

name: Me First
description: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Beak Blast, Belch, Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Me First, Metal Burst, Mirror Coat, Shell Trap, Struggle, Thief, or any Z-Move. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.
shortDescription: Copies a foe at 1.5x power. User must be faster.

name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
description: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Miracle Eye
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Odor Sleuth.
shortDescription: Psychic hits Dark. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Mirror Move
description: The user uses the last move used by the target. The copied move is used against that target, if possible. Fails if the target has not made a move, or if the last move used cannot be copied by this move.
shortDescription: User uses the target's last used move against it.

name: Mirror Shot
description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Moongeist Beam
description: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Morning Sun
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Mud Bomb
description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Mud Sport
description: For 5 turns, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, Electric-type attacks have 1/3 power.

name: Multi-Attack
description: This move's type depends on the user's held Memory.
shortDescription: Type varies based on the held Memory.

name: Natural Gift
description: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo or Magic Room is in effect for the user.
shortDescription: Power and type depends on the user's Berry.

name: Nature's Madness
description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

name: Needle Arm
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Never-Ending Nightmare
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Nightmare
description: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
shortDescription: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.

name: Oceanic Operetta
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Odor Sleuth
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Foresight or Miracle Eye.
shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Ominous Wind
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

name: Pollen Puff
description: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
shortDescription: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

name: Powder
description: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
shortDescription: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

name: Precipice Blades
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Grounded: +Psychic power, priority-safe.

name: Psycho Boost
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Psywave
description: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

name: Pulverizing Pancake
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Punishment
description: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
shortDescription: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

name: Purify
description: The target is cured if it has a non-volatile status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
shortDescription: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

name: Pursuit
description: If an adjacent opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
shortDescription: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

name: Quash
description: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
shortDescription: Forces the target to move last this turn.

name: Rage
description: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

name: Rapid Spin
description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.
shortDescription: Frees user from hazards, binding, Leech Seed.

name: Razor Wind
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

name: Refresh
description: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
shortDescription: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

name: Relic Song
description: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
shortDescription: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

name: Return
description: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
shortDescription: Max 102 power at maximum Happiness.

name: Revelation Dance
description: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
shortDescription: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

name: Rock Climb
description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 20% chance to confuse the target.

name: Rolling Kick
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Rototiller
description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Searing Sunraze Smash
description: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Secret Power
description: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain, causes paralysis during Electric Terrain, lowers Special Attack by 1 stage during Misty Terrain, causes sleep during Grassy Terrain and lowers Speed by 1 stage during Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

name: Seed Flare
description: Has a 40% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: 40% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 2.

name: Sharpen
description: Raises the user's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1.

name: Shattered Psyche
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Shore Up
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half down. If the weather is Sandstorm, the user instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User restores 1/2 its max HP; 2/3 in Sandstorm.

name: Signal Beam
description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to confuse the target.

name: Silver Wind
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

name: Sinister Arrow Raid
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Sketch
description: This move is permanently replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has the maximum PP for that move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, or if the move is Chatter, Sketch, Struggle, or any move the user knows.
shortDescription: Permanently copies the last move target used.

name: Sky Drop
description: This attack takes the target into the air with the user on the first turn and executes on the second. Pokemon weighing 200 kg or more cannot be lifted. On the first turn, the user and the target avoid all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister. The user and the target cannot make a move between turns, but the target can select a move to use. This move cannot damage Flying-type Pokemon. Fails on the first turn if the target is an ally, if the target has a substitute, or if the target is using Bounce, Dig, Dive, Fly, Phantom Force, Shadow Force, or Sky Drop.
shortDescription: User and foe fly up turn 1. Damages on turn 2.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop.

name: Smelling Salts
description: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of paralysis.
shortDescription: Power doubles if target is paralyzed, and cures it.

name: Snatch
description: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use one of those moves this turn, the applicable moves are all stolen by the first Pokemon in turn order that used this move this turn. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: User steals certain support moves to use itself.

name: Sonic Boom
description: Deals 20 HP of damage to the target.
shortDescription: Always does 20 HP of damage.

name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Spider Web
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Spike Cannon
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Splintered Stormshards
description: Ends the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: Ends the effects of terrain.

name: Spotlight
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from opponents of the target are redirected to the target. Such attacks are redirected to the target before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal.
shortDescription: Target's foes' moves are redirected to it this turn.

name: Steamroller
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Stoked Sparksurfer
description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 100% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Subzero Slammer
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Sunsteel Strike
description: This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

name: Supersonic Skystrike
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Swallow
description: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded half down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
shortDescription: Heals the user based on uses of Stockpile.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

name: Synchronoise
description: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if Delta Stream or no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

name: Tail Glow
description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 3 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 3.

name: Tectonic Rage
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Telekinesis
description: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows. The target is immune to this move on use if its species is Diglett, Dugtrio, Alolan Diglett, Alolan Dugtrio, Sandygast, Palossand, or Gengar while Mega-Evolved. Mega Gengar cannot be under this effect by any means.
shortDescription: For 3 turns, target floats but moves can't miss it.

name: Teleport
description: Fails when used.
shortDescription: Fails when used.

name: Toxic
description: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
shortDescription: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

name: Toxic Thread
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 stage and poisons it.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

name: Trick
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Z-Crystal, if neither is holding an item, if the user is trying to give or take a Mega Stone to or from the species that can Mega Evolve with it, or if the user is trying to give or take a Blue Orb, a Red Orb, a Griseous Orb, a Plate, a Drive, or a Memory to or from a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.
shortDescription: User switches its held item with the target's.

name: Trump Card
description: The power of this move is based on the amount of PP remaining after normal PP reduction and the Pressure Ability resolve. 200 power for 0 PP, 80 power for 1 PP, 60 power for 2 PP, 50 power for 3 PP, and 40 power for 4 or more PP.
shortDescription: More power the fewer PP this move has left.

name: Twineedle
description: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
shortDescription: Hits 2 times. Each hit has 20% chance to poison.

name: Twinkle Tackle
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.
shortDescription: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

name: Water Sport
description: For 5 turns, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, Fire-type attacks have 1/3 power.

name: Wring Out
description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

name: Ally Switch
description: The user swaps positions with its ally. Fails if the user is the only Pokemon on its side.
shortDescription: The user swaps positions with its ally.

name: Anchor Shot
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Aromatherapy
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

name: Aurora Veil
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical and special attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle; does not reduce damage further with Reflect or Light Screen. Critical hits ignore this protection. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Brick Break and Psychic Fangs remove the effect before damage is calculated. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails unless the weather is Hail.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, damage to allies is halved. Hail only.

name: Autotomize
description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages. If the user's Speed was changed, the user's weight is reduced by 100 kg as long as it remains active. This effect is stackable but cannot reduce the user's weight to less than 0.1 kg.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Speed by 2; user loses 100 kg.

name: Belch
description: This move cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry, either by eating one that was held, stealing and eating one off another Pokemon with Bug Bite or Pluck, or eating one that was thrown at it with Fling. Once the condition is met, this move can be selected and used for the rest of the battle even if the user gains or uses another item or switches out. Consuming a Berry with Natural Gift does not count for the purposes of eating one.
shortDescription: Cannot be selected until the user eats a Berry.

name: Blizzard
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. If the weather is Hail, this move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze foe(s). Can't miss in Hail.

name: Bonemerang
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
shortDescription: Hits 2 times in one turn.

name: Burn Up
description: Fails unless the user is a Fire type. If this move is successful, the user's Fire type becomes typeless as long as it remains active.
shortDescription: User's Fire type becomes typeless; must be Fire.

name: Celebrate
description: No competitive use.
shortDescription: No competitive use.

name: Charge
description: Raises the user's Special Defense by 1 stage. If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.
shortDescription: +1 SpD, user's Electric move next turn 2x power.

name: Copycat
description: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Baneful Bunker, Beak Blast, Belch, Bestow, Celebrate, Chatter, Circle Throw, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Dragon Tail, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Hold Hands, King's Shield, Mat Block, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Protect, Rage Powder, Roar, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Spiky Shield, Spotlight, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, Transform, Trick, Whirlwind, or any Z-Move.
shortDescription: Uses the last move used in the battle.

name: Core Enforcer
description: If the user moves after the target, the target's Ability is rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, or Zen Mode, this effect does not happen, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
shortDescription: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the foe(s) move first.

name: Crafty Shield
description: The user and its party members are protected from non-damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
shortDescription: Protects allies from Status moves this turn.

name: Cut
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Dual Chop
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
shortDescription: Hits 2 times in one turn.

name: Electrify
description: Causes the target's move to become Electric type this turn. Among effects that can change a move's type, this effect happens last. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
shortDescription: Changes the target's move to Electric this turn.

name: Flower Shield
description: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
shortDescription: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Gear Grind
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
shortDescription: Hits 2 times in one turn.

name: Gear Up
description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

name: Geomancy
description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

name: Grudge
description: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
shortDescription: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

name: Hail
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, hail crashes down.

name: Head Charge
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/4 recoil.

name: Hold Back
description: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
shortDescription: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

name: Hold Hands

The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.

If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
shortDescription: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

name: Instruct
description: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Celebrate, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, any two-turn move, any recharge move, or any Z-Move.
shortDescription: The target immediately uses its last used move.

name: Iron Defense
description: Raises the user's Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense by 2.

name: Iron Head
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Iron Tail
description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 30% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

name: Knock Off
description: If the target is holding an item that can be removed from it, ignoring the Sticky Hold Ability, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5. If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot remove Z-Crystals, cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item, cause Pokemon that can Mega Evolve to lose the Mega Stone for their species, or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, or a Silvally to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, or Memory respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
shortDescription: 1.5x damage if foe holds an item. Removes item.

name: Last Resort
description: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
shortDescription: Fails unless each known move has been used.

description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

name: Leech Life

shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Leech Seed
description: The Pokemon at the user's position steals 1/8 of the target's maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn. If Big Root is held by the recipient, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue being leeched. If the target switches out or uses Rapid Spin successfully, the effect ends. Grass-type Pokemon are immune to this move on use, but not its effect.

name: Light Screen

Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, special damage to allies is halved.

name: Liquidation

shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

name: Lock-On

shortDescription: User's next move will not miss the target.

name: Low Sweep
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Magic Room
description: For 5 turns, the held items of all active Pokemon have no effect. An item's effect of causing forme changes is unaffected, but any other effects from such items are negated. During the effect, Fling and Natural Gift are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, all held items have no effect.

name: Magma Storm
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Magnetic Flux

name: Magnet Rise
description: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the user has immunity to Ground.

name: Mean Look
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

shortDescription: Lowers target's Attack, Sp. Atk by 2. User faints.

name: Metal Burst
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If the user did not lose HP from that attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn.
shortDescription: If hit by an attack, returns 1.5x damage.

name: Metal Claw
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

name: Mimic

Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Chatter, Mimic, Sketch, Struggle, Transform, or any Z-Move.
shortDescription: The last move the target used replaces this one.

name: Minimize

Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Body Slam, Dragon Rush, Flying Press, Heat Crash, Heavy Slam, Malicious Moonsault, Steamroller, and Stomp will not check accuracy and have their damage doubled if used against the user while it is active.

description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Misty Terrain. During the effect, the power of Dragon-type attacks used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5 and grounded Pokemon cannot be inflicted with a non-volatile status condition nor confusion. Grounded Pokemon can become affected by Yawn but cannot fall asleep from its effect. Camouflage transforms the user into a Fairy type, Nature Power becomes Moonblast, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower Special Attack by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Misty Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Can't status,-Dragon power vs grounded.

name: Moonblast

name: Outrage
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Overheat
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.

name: Parting Shot

The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.

name: Payback

At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Phantom Force
description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

name: Photon Geyser

shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Play Nice
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.

name: Power Swap

shortDescription: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

name: Power Trick
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Power Trip
description: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
shortDescription: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

name: Power Whip
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Present

shortDescription: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

name: Prismatic Laser

name: Protect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

name: Psybeam
description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to confuse the target.

name: Psych Up
description: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
shortDescription: Copies the target's current stat stages.

name: Psychic

shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
shortDescription: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

name: Psycho Cut
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Psyshock
description: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
shortDescription: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

name: Psystrike
description: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
shortDescription: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

name: Quick Guard

This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

name: Quiver Dance

name: Rage Powder
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.

name: Rain Dance
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

name: Razor Leaf

name: Recycle
description: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
shortDescription: Restores the item the user last used.

name: Reflect
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

name: Reflect Type
description: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
shortDescription: User becomes the same type as the target.

name: Retaliate
description: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

name: Reversal

shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

name: Roar
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

name: Roar of Time

shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Role Play

Fails if the user's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Zen Mode, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Flower Gift, Forecast, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Trace, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.

name: Rollout

Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn. If this move hits an active Disguise during the effect, the power multiplier is paused but the turn counter is not, potentially allowing the multiplier to be used on the user's next move after this effect ends.

name: Round

Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

name: Sandstorm
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

name: Sand Tomb
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

name: Scald
description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
shortDescription: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

name: Scary Face
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Scratch
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Screech
description: Lowers the target's Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Defense by 2.

name: Seed Bomb
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Seismic Toss
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's level.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user faints after using this move, even if this move fails for having no target. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. The user faints.

name: Shadow Ball
description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Shadow Claw
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Shadow Force
description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

name: Shadow Punch
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Shadow Sneak
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Usually goes first.

name: Sheer Cold
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
shortDescription: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

name: Shell Smash
description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers Def, SpD by 1; raises Atk, SpA, Spe by 2.

name: Shift Gear
description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages and its Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Speed by 2 and Attack by 1.

name: Shock Wave
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Simple Beam

shortDescription: The target's Ability becomes Simple.

name: Sing
description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Illusion, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Wonder Guard, or Zen Mode.
shortDescription: The user and the target trade Abilities.

name: Sky Attack
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch and a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges, then hits turn 2. 30% flinch. High crit.

name: Slam
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Sludge Wave
description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to poison adjacent Pokemon.

name: Smack Down
description: This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If this move hits a target under the effect of Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, or Telekinesis, the effect ends. If the target is a Flying type that has not used Roost this turn or a Pokemon with the Levitate Ability, it loses its immunity to Ground-type attacks and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. During the effect, Magnet Rise fails for the target and Telekinesis fails against the target.

name: Smart Strike

shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

name: Snore
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Fails if the user is not asleep.
shortDescription: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.

name: Soak
description: Causes the target to become a Water type. Fails if the target is an Arceus or a Silvally, or if the target is already purely Water type.
shortDescription: Changes the target's type to Water.

name: Solar Beam
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

name: Solar Blade
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

name: Spacial Rend
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Spark
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Sparkling Aria
description: If the user has not fainted, the target is cured of its burn.
shortDescription: The target is cured of its burn.

name: Speed Swap
description: The user swaps its Speed stat with the target. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
shortDescription: Swaps Speed stat with target.

name: Spikes
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to three times before failing. Opponents lose 1/8 of their maximum HP with one layer, 1/6 of their maximum HP with two layers, and 1/4 of their maximum HP with three layers, all rounded down. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Hurts grounded foes on switch-in. Max 3 layers.

name: Spiky Shield
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn, and Pokemon making contact with the user lose 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
shortDescription: Protects from moves. Contact: loses 1/8 max HP.

name: Spirit Shackle
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Parting Shot, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Prevents the target from switching out.

name: Spit Up
description: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Whether or not this move is successful, the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.
shortDescription: More power with more uses of Stockpile.

name: Spite
description: Causes the target's last move used to lose 4 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if it no longer knows the move.
shortDescription: Lowers the PP of the target's last move by 4.

name: Splash
description: No competitive use.
shortDescription: No competitive use.

name: Spore
description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

name: Stealth Rock
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Fails if the effect is already active on the opposing side. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Hurts foes on switch-in. Factors Rock weakness.

name: Steam Eruption
description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
shortDescription: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

name: Steel Wing
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

name: Stockpile
description: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. The user's Stockpile count increases by 1. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 3. The user's Stockpile count is reset to 0 when it is no longer active.
shortDescription: Raises user's Defense, Sp. Def by 1. Max 3 uses.

name: Stomp
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Stomping Tantrum
description: Power doubles if the user's last move on the previous turn, including moves called by other moves or those used through Instruct, Magic Coat, Snatch, or the Dancer or Magic Bounce Abilities, failed to do any of its normal effects, not including damage from an unsuccessful High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, or Mind Blown, or if the user was prevented from moving by any effect other than recharging or Sky Drop. A move that was blocked by Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, Spiky Shield, Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard will not double this move's power, nor will Bounce or Fly ending early due to the effect of Gravity, Smack Down, or Thousand Arrows.
shortDescription: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

name: Stone Edge
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Stored Power
description: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
shortDescription: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

name: Strength
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Strength Sap
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage. The user restores its HP equal to the target's Attack stat calculated with its stat stage before this move was used. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down. Fails if the target's Attack stat stage is -6.
shortDescription: User heals HP=target's Atk stat. Lowers Atk by 1.

name: String Shot
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) Speed by 2.

name: Struggle
description: Deals typeless damage to a random opposing Pokemon. If this move was successful, the user loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up, and the Rock Head Ability does not prevent this. This move is automatically used if none of the user's known moves can be selected.
shortDescription: User loses 1/4 of its max HP.

name: Struggle Bug
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 1.

name: Stun Spore
description: Paralyzes the target.
shortDescription: Paralyzes the target.

name: Substitute
description: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, or if the user switches out or faints. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
shortDescription: User takes 1/4 its max HP to put in a substitute.

name: Sucker Punch
description: Fails if the target did not select a physical attack, special attack, or Me First for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.
shortDescription: Usually goes first. Fails if target is not attacking.

name: Sunny Day
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sunny Day. The damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Heat Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sunny Day.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, intense sunlight powers Fire moves.

name: Super Fang
description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

name: Superpower
description: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by 1.

name: Supersonic
description: Causes the target to become confused.
shortDescription: Causes the target to become confused.

name: Surf
description: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

name: Swagger
description: Raises the target's Attack by 2 stages and confuses it.
shortDescription: Raises the target's Attack by 2 and confuses it.

name: Sweet Kiss
description: Causes the target to become confused.
shortDescription: Causes the target to become confused.

shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) evasiveness by 2.
