name: Extreme Speed
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Nearly always goes first.

name: Facade
description: Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned. The physical damage halving effect from the user's burn is ignored.
shortDescription: Power doubles if user is burn/poison/paralyzed.

name: Fairy Lock
description: Prevents all active Pokemon from switching next turn. A Pokemon can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. Fails if the effect is already active.
shortDescription: Prevents all Pokemon from switching next turn.

name: Fairy Wind
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Fake Out
description: Has a 100% chance to make the target flinch. Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
shortDescription: Hits first. First turn out only. 100% flinch chance.

name: Fake Tears
description: Lowers the target's Special Defense by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Sp. Def by 2.

name: False Surrender
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: False Swipe
description: Leaves the target with at least 1 HP.
shortDescription: Always leaves the target with at least 1 HP.

name: Feather Dance
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack by 2.

name: Feint
description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.
shortDescription: Nullifies Detect, Protect, and Quick/Wide Guard.

name: Feint Attack
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Fell Stinger
description: Raises the user's Attack by 3 stages if this move knocks out the target.
shortDescription: Raises user's Attack by 3 if this KOes the target.

name: Fickle Beam
description: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.
shortDescription: Has a 30% chance this move's power is doubled.

name: Fiery Dance
description: Has a 50% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 50% chance to raise the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

name: Fiery Wrath
description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 20% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

name: Fillet Away
description: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages in exchange for the user losing 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Fails if the user would faint or if its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed stat stages would not change.
shortDescription: +2 Attack, Sp. Atk, Speed for 1/2 user's max HP.

name: Final Gambit
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the user's current HP. If this move is successful, the user faints.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to the user's HP. User faints.

name: Fire Blast
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fire Fang
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn. 10% chance to flinch.

name: Fire Lash
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

name: Fire Pledge
description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Grass Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Fire Gem.
shortDescription: Use with Grass or Water Pledge for added effect.

name: Fire Punch
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fire Spin
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

name: First Impression
description: Fails unless it is the user's first turn on the field.
shortDescription: Nearly always goes first. First turn out only.

name: Fishious Rend
description: Power doubles if the user moves before the target.
shortDescription: Power doubles if user moves before the target.

name: Fissure
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
shortDescription: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

name: Flail
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

name: Flame Burst
description: If this move is successful, the target's ally loses 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, unless it has the Magic Guard Ability.
shortDescription: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

name: Flame Charge
description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1.

name: Flame Wheel
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

name: Flamethrower
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Flare Blitz
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 33% recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

name: Flash
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Flash Cannon
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Flatter
description: Raises the target's Special Attack by 1 stage and confuses it.
shortDescription: Raises the target's Sp. Atk by 1 and confuses it.

name: Fleur Cannon
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Fling
description: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If there is no target or the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle or the Harvest Ability. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, if the user is under the effect of Embargo or Magic Room, or if the user has the Klutz Ability.
shortDescription: Flings the user's item at the target. Power varies.

name: Flip Turn
description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members, or if the target switched out using an Eject Button or through the effect of the Emergency Exit or Wimp Out Abilities.
shortDescription: User switches out after damaging the target.

name: Floral Healing
description: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the terrain is Grassy Terrain, the target instead restores 2/3 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

name: Flower Shield
description: Raises the Defense of all active Grass-type Pokemon by 1 stage. Fails if there are no active Grass-type Pokemon.
shortDescription: Raises Defense by 1 of all active Grass types.

name: Flower Trick
description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities. This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit; no accuracy check.

name: Fly
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Hurricane, Sky Uppercut, Smack Down, Thousand Arrows, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Flies up on first turn, then strikes the next turn.

name: Flying Press
description: This move combines Flying in its type effectiveness against the target. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: Combines Flying in its type effectiveness.

name: Focus Blast
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Focus Energy
description: Raises the user's chance for a critical hit by 2 stages. Fails if the user already has the effect. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
shortDescription: Raises the user's critical hit ratio by 2.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move.
shortDescription: Fails if the user takes damage before it hits.

name: Follow Me
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

name: Force Palm
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Foresight
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type. Fails if the target is already affected, or affected by Miracle Eye or Odor Sleuth.
shortDescription: Fighting, Normal hit Ghost. Evasiveness ignored.

name: Forest's Curse
description: Causes the Grass type to be added to the target, effectively making it have two or three types. Fails if the target is already a Grass type. If Trick-or-Treat adds a type to the target, it replaces the type added by this move and vice versa.
shortDescription: Adds Grass to the target's type(s).

name: Foul Play
description: Damage is calculated using the target's Attack stat, including stat stage changes. The user's Ability, item, and burn are used as normal.
shortDescription: Uses target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

name: Freeze-Dry
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. This move's type effectiveness against Water is changed to be super effective no matter what this move's type is.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze. Super effective on Water.

name: Freeze Shock
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. 30% paralyze.

name: Freezing Glare
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze the target.

name: Frenzy Plant
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Frost Breath
description: This move is always a critical hit unless the target is under the effect of Lucky Chant or has the Battle Armor or Shell Armor Abilities.
shortDescription: Always results in a critical hit.

name: Frustration
description: Power is equal to the greater of ((255 - user's Happiness) * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
shortDescription: Max 102 power at minimum Happiness.

name: Fury Attack
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Fury Cutter
description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

name: Fury Swipes
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Fusion Bolt
description: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Flare.
shortDescription: Power doubles if used after Fusion Flare this turn.

name: Fusion Flare
description: Power doubles if the last move used by any Pokemon this turn was Fusion Bolt.
shortDescription: Power doubles if used after Fusion Bolt this turn.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Gastro Acid
description: Causes the target's Ability to be rendered ineffective as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under this effect. If the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero, this move fails, and receiving the effect through Baton Pass ends the effect immediately.
shortDescription: Nullifies the target's Ability.

name: Gear Grind
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit.
shortDescription: Hits 2 times in one turn.

name: Gear Up
description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of Pokemon on the user's side with the Plus or Minus Abilities by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

name: Genesis Supernova
description: If this move is successful, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: Summons Psychic Terrain.

name: Geomancy
description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 2 stages. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges, then raises SpA, SpD, Spe by 2 turn 2.

name: Giga Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Giga Impact
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Gigaton Hammer
description: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.
shortDescription: Cannot be selected the turn after it's used.

name: Gigavolt Havoc
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Glacial Lance
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Glaciate
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

name: Glaive Rush
description: If this move is successful, moves targeted at the user deal double damage and do not check accuracy until the user's next turn.
shortDescription: User takes sure-hit 2x damage until its next turn.

name: Glare
description: Paralyzes the target.
shortDescription: Paralyzes the target.

name: G-Max Befuddle
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either falls asleep, becomes poisoned, or becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: slp or psn or par.

name: G-Max Cannonade
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Water-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

name: G-Max Centiferno
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

name: G-Max Chi Strike
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has their critical hit ratio raised by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: Crit Ratio +1.

name: G-Max Cuddle
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes infatuated, even if they have a substitute. This effect does not happen for a target if both it and the user are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: infatuated.

name: G-Max Depletion
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side loses 2 PP from its last move used, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: last move -2 PP.

name: G-Max Drum Solo
description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

name: G-Max Finale
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side restores 1/6 of its current maximum HP, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: +1/6 max HP.

name: G-Max Fireball
description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

name: G-Max Foam Burst
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the Speed of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 2 stages, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -2 Speed.

name: G-Max Gold Rush
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

name: G-Max Gravitas
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Gravity begins.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Starts Gravity.

name: G-Max Hydrosnipe
description: Power is 160 regardless of the base move's Max Move power. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Always 160 power. Ignores Abilities.

name: G-Max Malodor
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes poisoned, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: poisoned.

name: G-Max Meltdown
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Torment begins for each Pokemon on the opposing side, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Tormented.

name: G-Max One Blow
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

name: G-Max Rapid Flow
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. This move bypasses all protection effects, including Max Guard.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Bypasses Max Guard.

name: G-Max Replenish
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance every Pokemon on the user's side has its Berry restored, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. 50% restores Berries.

name: G-Max Resonance
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effect of Aurora Veil begins on the user's side.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: Aurora Veil.

name: G-Max Sandblast
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw), even if they have a substitute. Causes damage equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends for a target if it leaves the field, or if it uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: bound 4-5 turns.

name: G-Max Smite
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes confused, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: confused.

name: G-Max Snooze
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, there is a 50% chance the effect of Yawn begins on the target, even if it has a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Target: 50% Yawn.

name: G-Max Steelsurge
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Steel type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Steel hazard.

name: G-Max Stonesurge
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, it sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, damaging each opposing Pokemon that switches in. Foes lose 1/32, 1/16, 1/8, 1/4, or 1/2 of their maximum HP, rounded down, based on their weakness to the Rock type; 0.25x, 0.5x, neutral, 2x, or 4x, respectively. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin or Defog successfully, or is hit by Defog.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: Stealth Rock.

name: G-Max Stun Shock
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side either becomes poisoned or paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: psn or par.

name: G-Max Sweetness
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the user's side has its status condition cured, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Allies: status cured.

name: G-Max Tartness
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the evasiveness of each Pokemon on the opposing side is lowered by 1 stage, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1 evasiveness.

name: G-Max Terror
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side is prevented from switching out, even if they have a substitute. They can still switch out if they are holding Shed Shell or use Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If a target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: trapped.

name: G-Max Vine Lash
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Grass-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

name: G-Max Volcalith
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Rock-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

name: G-Max Volt Crash
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, each Pokemon on the opposing side becomes paralyzed, even if they have a substitute.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: paralyzed.

name: G-Max Wildfire
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, for 4 turns each non-Fire-type Pokemon on the opposing side takes damage equal to 1/6 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Foes: -1/6 HP, 4 turns.

name: G-Max Wind Rage
description: Power is equal to the base move's Max Move power. If this move is successful, the effects of Electric Terrain, Grassy Terrain, Misty Terrain, and Psychic Terrain end, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, Aurora Veil, Safeguard, Mist, G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the target's side, and the effects of G-Max Steelsurge, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Stealth Rock, and Sticky Web end for the user's side.
shortDescription: Base move affects power. Ends Terrain, hazards.

name: Grass Knot
description: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
shortDescription: More power the heavier the target.

name: Grass Pledge
description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Water Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Fire Pledge with 150 power and a sea of fire appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which causes damage to non-Fire types equal to 1/8 of their maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect, including the last turn. If combined with Water Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Grass Gem.
shortDescription: Use with Fire or Water Pledge for added effect.

name: Grass Whistle
description: Causes the target to fall asleep.
shortDescription: Causes the target to fall asleep.

name: Grassy Glide
description: If the current terrain is Grassy Terrain and the user is grounded, this move has its priority increased by 1.
shortDescription: User on Grassy Terrain: +1 priority.

name: Grassy Terrain
description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain. During the effect, the power of Grass-type attacks used by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3, the power of Bulldoze, Earthquake, and Magnitude used against grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 0.5, and grounded Pokemon have 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, restored at the end of each turn, including the last turn. Camouflage transforms the user into a Grass type, Nature Power becomes Energy Ball, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to cause sleep. Fails if the current terrain is Grassy Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Grounded: +Grass power, +1/16 max HP.

name: Grav Apple
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage. Power is multiplied by 1.5 during Gravity's effect.
shortDescription: Target: 100% -1 Def. During Gravity: 1.5x power.

name: Gravity
description: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, and Telekinesis end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, Flying Press, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, Sky Drop, Splash, and Telekinesis are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, Sticky Web, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.
shortDescription: 5 turns: no Ground immunities, 1.67x accuracy.

name: Growl
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) Attack by 1.

name: Growth
description: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
shortDescription: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

name: Grudge
description: Until the user's next turn, if an opposing Pokemon's attack knocks the user out, that move loses all its remaining PP.
shortDescription: If the user faints, the attack used loses all its PP.

name: Guardian of Alola
description: Deals damage to the target equal to 3/4 of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

name: Guard Split
description: The user and the target have their Defense and Special Defense stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Defense and Special Defense stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
shortDescription: Averages Defense and Sp. Def stats with target.

name: Guard Swap
description: The user swaps its Defense and Special Defense stat stage changes with the target.
shortDescription: Swaps Defense and Sp. Def changes with target.

name: Guillotine
description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + 30)%, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
shortDescription: OHKOs the target. Fails if user is a lower level.

name: Gunk Shot
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Gust
description: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

name: Gyro Ball
description: Power is equal to (25 * target's current Speed / user's current Speed) + 1, rounded down, but not more than 150. If the user's current Speed is 0, this move's power is 1.
shortDescription: More power the slower the user than the target.

name: Hail
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, Overcoat, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, hail crashes down.

name: Hammer Arm
description: Lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Speed by 1.

name: Happy Hour
description: No competitive use.
shortDescription: No competitive use.

name: Harden
description: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

name: Hard Press
description: Power is equal to 100 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP), rounded half down, but not less than 1.
shortDescription: More power the more HP the target has left.

name: Haze
description: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
shortDescription: Eliminates all stat changes.

name: Headbutt
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Head Charge
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/4 recoil.

name: Headlong Rush
description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 1.

name: Head Smash

shortDescription: Has 1/2 recoil.

name: Heal Bell
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Active Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
shortDescription: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.

name: Heal Block
description: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, the foe(s) is prevented from healing.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints, and if the Pokemon brought out to replace it does not have full HP or has a non-volatile status condition, its HP is fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The replacement is sent out at the end of the turn, and the healing happens before hazards take effect. This effect continues until a Pokemon that meets either of these conditions switches in at the user's position or gets swapped into the position with Ally Switch. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.
shortDescription: User faints. Next hurt Pokemon is fully healed.

name: Heal Order
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

name: Heal Pulse
description: The target restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user has the Mega Launcher Ability, the target instead restores 3/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half down.
shortDescription: Heals the target by 50% of its max HP.

name: Heart Stamp
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Heart Swap
description: The user swaps all its stat stage changes with the target.

name: Heat Crash
description: The power of this move depends on (user's weight / target's weight), rounded down. Power is equal to 120 if the result is 5 or more, 100 if 4, 80 if 3, 60 if 2, and 40 if 1 or less. Damage doubles and no accuracy check is done if the target has used Minimize while active.
shortDescription: More power the heavier the user than the target.

name: Heat Wave
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Heavy Slam

name: Hex
description: Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.
shortDescription: Power doubles if the target has a status ailment.

name: High Horsepower

name: High Jump Kick

If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 70%.

name: Hydro Cannon

name: Hydro Pump

name: Hydro Steam

If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally.

Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.

name: Ice Beam

name: Ice Burn

name: Ice Fang
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch.

If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Icy Wind
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.

name: Imprison

shortDescription: No foe can use any move known by the user.

name: Incinerate

shortDescription: Destroys the foe(s) Berry/Gem.

name: Infernal Parade
description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. Power doubles if the target has a non-volatile status condition.

name: Infestation
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

name: Ingrain
description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and Sticky Web, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.
shortDescription: Traps/grounds user; heals 1/16 max HP per turn.

name: Instruct
description: The target immediately uses its last used move. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, if the target is preparing to use Beak Blast, Focus Punch, or Shell Trap, or if the move is Assist, Beak Blast, Belch, Bide, Blazing Torque, Celebrate, Chatter, Combat Torque, Copycat, Dynamax Cannon, Focus Punch, Hold Hands, Ice Ball, Instruct, King's Shield, Magical Torque, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Move, Nature Power, Noxious Torque, Obstruct, Outrage, Petal Dance, Rollout, Shell Trap, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Struggle, Thrash, Transform, Uproar, Wicked Torque, any two-turn move, or any recharge move.

X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Knock Off

If the user has not fainted, the target loses its held item. This move cannot cause Pokemon with the Sticky Hold Ability to lose their held item or cause a Kyogre, a Groudon, a Giratina, an Arceus, a Genesect, a Silvally, a Zacian, or a Zamazenta to lose their Blue Orb, Red Orb, Griseous Orb, Plate, Drive, Memory, Rusted Sword, or Rusted Shield respectively. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

name: Magic Coat

name: Magma Storm

The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Parabolic Charge
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded half up. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded half down.
shortDescription: User recovers 50% of the damage dealt.

name: Parting Shot
description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If this move is successful, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if the target's Attack and Special Attack stat stages were both unchanged, or if there are no unfainted party members.
shortDescription: Lowers target's Atk, Sp. Atk by 1. User switches.

name: Payback
description: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn, including actions taken through Instruct or the Dancer Ability. Switching in does not count as an action.
shortDescription: Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

name: Pay Day
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Scatters coins.

name: Peck
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Perish Song
description: Each active Pokemon receives a perish count of 4 if it doesn't already have a perish count. At the end of each turn including the turn used, the perish count of all active Pokemon lowers by 1 and Pokemon faint if the number reaches 0. The perish count is removed from Pokemon that switch out. If a Pokemon uses Baton Pass while it has a perish count, the replacement will gain the perish count and continue to count down.
shortDescription: All active Pokemon will faint in 3 turns.

name: Petal Blizzard
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Phantom Force
description: If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Baneful Bunker, Detect, King's Shield, Protect, or Spiky Shield for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally. If the target's side is protected by Crafty Shield, Mat Block, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard, that protection is also broken for this turn and other Pokemon may attack the target's side normally. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Disappears turn 1. Hits turn 2. Breaks protection.

name: Photon Geyser
description: This move becomes a physical attack if the user's Attack is greater than its Special Attack, including stat stage changes. This move and its effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.
shortDescription: Physical if user's Atk > Sp. Atk. Ignores Abilities.

name: Pin Missile
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Plasma Fists
description: If this move is successful, causes Normal-type moves to become Electric type this turn.
shortDescription: Normal moves become Electric type this turn.

name: Play Nice
description: Lowers the target's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Attack by 1.

name: Play Rough
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

name: Pluck
description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
shortDescription: User steals and eats the target's Berry.

name: Poison Fang
description: Has a 50% chance to badly poison the target.
shortDescription: 50% chance to badly poison the target.

name: Poison Gas
description: Poisons the target.
shortDescription: Poisons the foe(s).

name: Poison Jab
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Poison Powder
description: Poisons the target.
shortDescription: Poisons the target.

name: Poison Sting
description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
shortDescription: 30% chance to poison the target.

name: Poison Tail
description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to poison.

name: Pollen Puff
description: If the target is an ally, this move restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down, instead of dealing damage.
shortDescription: If the target is an ally, heals 50% of its max HP.

name: Poltergeist
description: Fails if the target has no held item.
shortDescription: Fails if the target has no held item.

name: Population Bomb
description: Hits ten times. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit ten times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move hits four to ten times at random without checking accuracy between hits.
shortDescription: Hits 10 times. Each hit can miss.

name: Pounce
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

name: Pound
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Powder
description: If the target uses a Fire-type move this turn, it is prevented from executing and the target loses 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. This effect does not happen if the Fire-type move is prevented by Primordial Sea.
shortDescription: If using a Fire move, target loses 1/4 max HP.

name: Powder Snow
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze the foe(s).

name: Power Gem
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Power Shift
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Power Split
description: The user and the target have their Attack and Special Attack stats set to be equal to the average of the user and the target's Attack and Special Attack stats, respectively, rounded down. Stat stage changes are unaffected.
shortDescription: Averages Attack and Sp. Atk stats with target.

name: Power Swap
description: The user swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat stage changes with the target.
shortDescription: Swaps Attack and Sp. Atk stat stages with target.

name: Power Trick
description: The user swaps its Attack and Defense stats, and stat stage changes remain on their respective stats. This move can be used again to swap the stats back. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will have its Attack and Defense stats swapped if the effect is active. If the user has its stats recalculated by changing forme while its stats are swapped, this effect is ignored but is still active for the purposes of Baton Pass.
shortDescription: Switches user's Attack and Defense stats.

name: Power Trip
description: Power is equal to 20+(X*20), where X is the user's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0.
shortDescription: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

name: Power-Up Punch
description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1.

name: Power Whip
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Precipice Blades
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Present
description: If this move is successful, it deals damage or heals the target. 40% chance for 40 power, 30% chance for 80 power, 10% chance for 120 power, and 20% chance to heal the target by 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
shortDescription: 40, 80, 120 power, or heals target 1/4 max HP.

name: Prismatic Laser
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Protect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn.
shortDescription: Prevents moves from affecting the user this turn.

name: Psybeam
description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to confuse the target.

name: Psyblade
description: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain, this move's power is multiplied by 1.5.
shortDescription: During Electric Terrain: 1.5x power.

name: Psych Up
description: The user copies all of the target's current stat stage changes.
shortDescription: Copies the target's current stat stages.

name: Psychic
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Psychic Fangs
description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
shortDescription: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

name: Psychic Noise
description: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing and draining moves are unusable, and Abilities and items that grant healing will not heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain unable to restore its HP. Pain Split and the Regenerator Ability are unaffected.
shortDescription: For 2 turns, the target is prevented from healing.

name: Psychic Terrain
description: For 5 turns, the terrain becomes Psychic Terrain. During the effect, the power of Psychic-type attacks made by grounded Pokemon is multiplied by 1.3 and grounded Pokemon cannot be hit by moves with priority greater than 0, unless the target is an ally. Camouflage transforms the user into a Psychic type, Nature Power becomes Psychic, and Secret Power has a 30% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage. Fails if the current terrain is Psychic Terrain.
shortDescription: 5 turns. Grounded: +Psychic power, priority-safe.

name: Psycho Boost
description: Lowers the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Psycho Cut
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Psycho Shift
description: The user's non-volatile status condition is transferred to the target, and the user is then cured. Fails if the user has no non-volatile status condition or if the target already has one.
shortDescription: Transfers the user's status ailment to the target.

name: Psyshield Bash
description: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to raise the user's Defense by 1.

name: Psyshock
description: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
shortDescription: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

name: Psystrike
description: Deals damage to the target based on its Defense instead of Special Defense.
shortDescription: Damages target based on Defense, not Sp. Def.

name: Psywave
description: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 100, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Random damage equal to 0.5x-1.5x user's level.

name: Pulverizing Pancake
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Punishment
description: Power is equal to 60+(X*20), where X is the target's total stat stage changes that are greater than 0, but not more than 200 power.
shortDescription: 60 power +20 for each of the target's stat boosts.

name: Purify
description: The target is cured if it has a non-volatile status condition. If the target was cured, the user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.
shortDescription: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 max HP if so.

name: Pursuit
description: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon does not become active until the end of the turn.
shortDescription: If a foe is switching out, hits it at 2x power.

name: Pyro Ball
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

name: Quash
description: Causes the target to take its turn after all other Pokemon this turn, no matter the priority of its selected move. Fails if the target already moved this turn.
shortDescription: Forces the target to move last this turn.

name: Quick Attack
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: Usually goes first.

name: Quick Guard
description: The user and its party members are protected from attacks with original or altered priority greater than 0 made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn. This move modifies the same 1/X chance of being successful used by other protection moves, where X starts at 1 and triples each time this move is successfully used, but does not use the chance to check for failure. X resets to 1 if this move fails, if the user's last move used is not Baneful Bunker, Burning Bulwark, Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Max Guard, Obstruct, Protect, Quick Guard, Silk Trap, Spiky Shield, or Wide Guard, or if it was one of those moves and the user's protection was broken. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
shortDescription: Protects allies from priority attacks this turn.

name: Quiver Dance
description: Raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed by 1.

name: Rage
description: Once this move is successfully used, the user's Attack is raised by 1 stage every time it is hit by another Pokemon's attack as long as this move is chosen for use.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 1 if hit during use.

name: Rage Fist
description: Power is equal to 50+(X*50), where X is the total number of times the user has been hit by a damaging attack during the battle, even if the user did not lose HP from the attack. X cannot be greater than 6 and does not reset upon switching out or fainting. Each hit of a multi-hit attack is counted, but confusion damage is not counted.
shortDescription: +50 power for each time user was hit. Max 6 hits.

name: Rage Powder
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat or the Magic Bounce Ability, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. Fails if it is not a Double Battle or Battle Royal. This effect is ignored while the user is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: The foes' moves target the user on the turn used.

name: Raging Bull
description: If this attack does not miss, the effects of Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated. If the user's current form is a Paldean Tauros, this move's type changes to match. Fighting type for Combat Breed, Fire type for Blaze Breed, and Water type for Aqua Breed.
shortDescription: Destroys screens. Type depends on user's form.

name: Raging Fury
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused immediately after its move on the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target on the first turn of the effect or the second turn of a three-turn effect, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk and the user is asleep, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.
shortDescription: Lasts 2-3 turns. Confuses the user afterwards.

name: Rain Dance
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Rain Dance. The damage of Water-type attacks is multiplied by 1.5 and the damage of Fire-type attacks is multiplied by 0.5 during the effect. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Damp Rock. Fails if the current weather is Rain Dance.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, heavy rain powers Water moves.

name: Rapid Spin
description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end for the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field. Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Free user from hazards/bind/Leech Seed; +1 Spe.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Razor Shell
description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

name: Razor Wind
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.
shortDescription: Charges, then hits foe(s) turn 2. High crit ratio.

name: Recover
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up.
shortDescription: Heals the user by 50% of its max HP.

name: Recycle
description: The user regains the item it last used. Fails if the user is holding an item, if the user has not held an item, if the item was a popped Air Balloon, if the item was picked up by a Pokemon with the Pickup Ability, or if the item was lost to Bug Bite, Corrosive Gas, Covet, Incinerate, Knock Off, Pluck, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.
shortDescription: Restores the item the user last used.

name: Reflect
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 0.5x damage from physical attacks, or 0.66x damage if in a Double Battle. Damage is not reduced further with Aurora Veil. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break, Psychic Fangs, or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, physical damage to allies is halved.

name: Reflect Type
description: Causes the user's types to become the same as the current types of the target. If the target's current types include typeless and a non-added type, typeless is ignored. If the target's current types include typeless and an added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat, typeless is copied as the Normal type instead. Fails if the user is an Arceus or a Silvally, if the user is Terastallized, or if the target's current type is typeless alone.
shortDescription: User becomes the same type as the target.

name: Refresh
description: The user cures its burn, poison, or paralysis. Fails if the user is not burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.
shortDescription: User cures its burn, poison, or paralysis.

name: Relic Song
description: Has a 10% chance to cause the target to fall asleep. If this move is successful on at least one target and the user is a Meloetta, it changes to Pirouette Forme if it is currently in Aria Forme, or changes to Aria Forme if it is currently in Pirouette Forme. This forme change does not happen if the Meloetta has the Sheer Force Ability. The Pirouette Forme reverts to Aria Forme when Meloetta is not active.
shortDescription: 10% chance to sleep foe(s). Meloetta transforms.

name: Rest
description: The user falls asleep for the next two turns and restores all of its HP, curing itself of any non-volatile status condition in the process. Fails if the user has full HP, is already asleep, or if another effect is preventing sleep.
shortDescription: User sleeps 2 turns and restores HP and status.

name: Retaliate
description: Power doubles if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles if an ally fainted last turn.

name: Return
description: Power is equal to the greater of (user's Happiness * 2/5), rounded down, or 1.
shortDescription: Max 102 power at maximum Happiness.

name: Revelation Dance
description: This move's type depends on the user's primary type. If the user's primary type is typeless, this move's type is the user's secondary type if it has one, otherwise the added type from Forest's Curse or Trick-or-Treat. This move is typeless if the user's type is typeless alone.
shortDescription: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

name: Revenge
description: Power doubles if the user was hit by the target this turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles if user is damaged by the target.

name: Reversal
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 33 to 48, 40 if X is 17 to 32, 80 if X is 10 to 16, 100 if X is 5 to 9, 150 if X is 2 to 4, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 48 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.
shortDescription: More power the less HP the user has left.

name: Revival Blessing
description: A fainted party member is selected and revived with 1/2 its max HP, rounded down. Fails if there are no fainted party members.
shortDescription: Revives a fainted Pokemon to 50% HP.

name: Rising Voltage
description: If the current terrain is Electric Terrain and the target is grounded, this move's power is doubled.
shortDescription: 2x power if target is grounded in Electric Terrain.

name: Roar
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

name: Roar of Time
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Rock Blast
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the user is holding Loaded Dice, this move will hit 4-5 times.
shortDescription: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

name: Rock Climb
description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
shortDescription: 20% chance to confuse the target.

name: Rock Polish
description: Raises the user's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Speed by 2.

name: Rock Slide
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the foe(s) flinch.

name: Rock Smash
description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

name: Rock Throw
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1.

name: Rock Wrecker
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Role Play
description: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Disguise, Gulp Missile, Ice Face, Multitype, Power Construct, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shift, Zen Mode, Zero to Hero, or already matches the target, or if the target's Ability is As One, Battle Bond, Comatose, Commander, Disguise, Embody Aspect, Flower Gift, Forecast, Hunger Switch, Ice Face, Illusion, Imposter, Multitype, Neutralizing Gas, Poison Puppeteer, Power Construct, Power of Alchemy, Protosynthesis, Quark Drive, Receiver, RKS System, Schooling, Shields Down, Stance Change, Tera Shell, Tera Shift, Teraform Zero, Trace, Wonder Guard, Zen Mode, or Zero to Hero.
shortDescription: User replaces its Ability with the target's.

name: Rolling Kick
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Rollout
description: If this move is successful, the user is locked into this move and cannot make another move until it misses, 5 turns have passed, or the attack cannot be used. Power doubles with each successful hit of this move and doubles again if Defense Curl was used previously by the user. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit. Repeats for 5 turns.

name: Roost
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded half up. If the user is not Terastallized, until the end of the turn Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become Normal type. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.
shortDescription: Heals 50% HP. Flying-type removed 'til turn ends.

name: Rototiller
description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all grounded Grass-type Pokemon on the field by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises Atk/Sp. Atk of grounded Grass types by 1.

name: Round
description: If there are other active Pokemon that chose this move for use this turn, those Pokemon take their turn immediately after the user, in Speed order, and this move's power is 120 for each other user.
shortDescription: Power doubles if others used Round this turn.

name: Ruination
description: Deals damage to the target equal to half of its current HP, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

name: Sacred Fire
description: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 50% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

name: Sacred Sword
description: Ignores the target's stat stage changes, including evasiveness.
shortDescription: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

name: Safeguard
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members cannot have non-volatile status conditions or confusion inflicted on them by other Pokemon. Pokemon on the user's side cannot become affected by Yawn but can fall asleep from its effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Defog. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, protects user's party from status.

name: Salt Cure
description: Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/4 if the target is Steel or Water type), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. This effect ends when the target is no longer active.
shortDescription: Deals 1/8 max HP each turn; 1/4 on Steel, Water.

name: Sand Attack
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Sandsear Storm
description: Has a 20% chance to burn the target. If the weather is Primordial Sea or Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If this move is used against a Pokemon holding Utility Umbrella, this move's accuracy remains at 80%.
shortDescription: 20% chance to burn foe(s). Can't miss in rain.

name: Sandstorm
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard, Overcoat, Sand Force, Sand Rush, or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.
shortDescription: For 5 turns, a sandstorm rages. Rock: 1.5x SpD.

name: Sand Tomb
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP (1/6 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, Flip Turn, Parting Shot, Shed Tail, Teleport, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Mortal Spin, Rapid Spin, or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

name: Savage Spin-Out
description: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.
shortDescription: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

name: Scald
description: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen.
shortDescription: 30% chance to burn the target. Thaws target.

name: Scale Shot
description: Hits two to five times. Lowers the user's Defense by 1 stage and raises the user's Speed by 1 stage after the last hit. Has a 35% chance to hit two or three times and a 15% chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. description: Deals damage to the target equal to the target's maximum HP. Ignores accuracy and evasiveness modifiers. This attack's accuracy is equal to (user's level - target's level + X)%, where X is 30 if the user is an Ice type and 20 otherwise, and fails if the target is at a higher level. Ice-type Pokemon and Pokemon with the Sturdy Ability are immune.
shortDescription: OHKOs non-Ice targets. Fails if user's lower level.

name: Shell Side Arm
description: Has a 20% chance to poison the target. This move becomes a physical attack that makes contact if the value of ((((2 * the user's level / 5 + 2) * 90 * X) / Y) / 50), where X is the user's Attack stat and Y is the target's Defense stat, is greater than the same value where X is the user's Special Attack stat and Y is the target's Special Defense stat. No stat modifiers other than stat stage changes are considered for this purpose. If the two values are equal, this move chooses a damage category at random.
shortDescription: 20% psn. Physical+contact if it would be stronger.

name: Shell Smash
description: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2 stages.

If the opponent's physical attack had a secondary effect removed by the Sheer Force Ability, it does not count for the purposes of this effect.

name: Substitute
description: The user takes 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, and puts it into a substitute to take its place in battle. The substitute is removed once enough damage is inflicted on it, if the user switches out or faints, or if any Pokemon uses Tidy Up. Baton Pass can be used to transfer the substitute to an ally, and the substitute will keep its remaining HP. Until the substitute is broken, it receives damage from all attacks made by other Pokemon and shields the user from status effects and stat stage changes caused by other Pokemon. Sound-based moves and Pokemon with the Infiltrator Ability ignore substitutes. The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.
